html:
1.1.24  9:58 am   Would you compare yourself to Chuck Lorre, who made The Big Bang Theory?

      not quite

1.1.24  8:15 am   You said you wouldn't make music for video games unless you also made the game. Does this mean you have difficulty looking at a scenario and writing music to describe it emotionally?

     no, that's one of my strong points. i score my own videos in precisely this way

     Like could you score a film by watching a scene and trying to make music that feels the same way the scene makes you feel, or amplifies/compliments the feelings already in the scene?

     of course. i score my own videos in precisely this way

     Sometimes I just wonder what would have happened if you had been paid a billion dollars to watch star wars and think of music to go with it. I mean what would that cantina song have been? 

     i'd love to score star wars, but i'm not going to do it. for many reasons, not the least of which: star wars is already completed

1.1.24  8:14 am   i just realized how boring i am. i believe i should start a new hobby to combat this, preferably something outdoors. what would you recommend

      you could be a door to door door salesman

1.1.24  8:08 am   what if fiction was real?

      then non-real stories would become known as 'non-fiction'

1.1.24  7:48 am   What is a good way to de-escalate a fit of anger?

      how about a dance/exercise routine

1.1.24  7:20 am   what do you think of Pink Floyd

      neither pink nor floyd. somehow it still works, despite this

1.1.24  7:01 am   If you could go back and experience a day in the life of an average person from any place at any time in history, where and when would you choose to go? (You can come back to the present after and tell people about it)

      i won't know what i would choose until i am actually presented with that situation. and the way you described it also did not necessarily make it clear that i have to choose. it might be possible to do it many times

1.1.24  5:55 am   how do i avoid resenting the world for making me talk to other people

      find your own way of talking to people that's more fun, yet still compatible with the way other people talk. i know this sounds impossible, but the great secret is that it totally is possible and i've been very excited to tell you the news of this

1.1.24  3:57 am   what's your favorite joke

      the truth

1.1.24  3:51 am   is today your favorite holiday?

      yes

1.1.24  3:45 am   how does this even work?

      like this

1.1.24  3:30 am   hows the new year been so far?

      good

1.1.24  3:08 am   have you stopped listening to music that is popular 

      no

1.1.24  2:50 am   Would you say you enjoy films and movies 

      almost

1.1.24  2:28 am   Do you have to shave your piano regularly?

     no

     Or was it just a one time thing?

     it was fictional

1.1.24  2:01 am   when you get a haircut and people say it looks good are they being genuine or are they just saying it to be nice

      usually their main point is that they noticed it

1.1.24  1:09 am   My question feels Too delicate to grasp with my clumsy, drowsy fingers. I don't want to Break anything, so I might try again some other time to type 2 you what 1'm feeling

      ok

1.1.24  12:50 am   Why is it so hard to learn guitar or any string instrument?

      this will make it more fun and interesting for you, over the long term

1.1.24  12:30 am   Am I the first question of 2024?

      no

1.1.24  12:26 am   how often do you get attempts at people trying to send you the first question of the year

      it happens every couple of days or so

1.1.24  12:00 am   happy new year

      i see where you're going with this





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

12.31.23  11:59 pm   Ever thought of using a different font?

      sure. i use different fonts in videos. but on this website i mostly don't use fonts

12.31.23  11:39 pm   do you eat toothpaste??

      no

12.31.23  11:12 pm   how do i become able to create music with words, it scares me

      just try it and see if the result is scarier than your feelings about it

12.31.23  10:57 pm   when i'm trying to feel confident, the reality creeps in and tell me if i do a certain thing with my confidence it maybe won't turn out well, but i also have that kind of feeling that everyone are only young for once, and some people probably do it worse than me and still went for it, so it makes me want to do it again, and i'm stuck in this loop and it annoys me, what should i do in this circumstance? do i go for it or do i give up?

(this thing that i'm thinking won't cause any harm to me or my surroundings)

      you're doing fine

12.31.23  10:46 pm   Are you excited for the new year?

      yes

12.31.23  10:12 pm   Hey! Do you want to know a secret? 

      i'd like to know all the secrets at some point

12.31.23  9:33 pm   Thoughts on phonies?

      they are featured as the antagonist in Catcher in the Rye, if i remember correctly

12.31.23  9:28 pm   how's life in 2024 mr wurtz

      i mostly don't know yet

12.31.23  9:00 pm   Do you think metal is a good genre?

      you'd have to be more specific. never mind, the music is good but the genre label will never be enough to accurately describe which music you are talking about

12.31.23  8:07 pm   What do you think of fireworks?

     they seem futuristic and old fashioned at the same time

     I fucking hate it because all animals get mad and scared at it, it's just inconvenient, loud and stupid.

12.31.23  7:50 pm   What was the last video you made in the television studio that you lived in during 2011?

      probably some sort of packing up and getting ready to leave video

12.31.23  6:39 pm   It's new years already where I live and I'd like to wish you a happy new year in advance and ask: how's your year been?

      i'd better not jinx it

12.31.23  5:57 pm   is it weird that my words bounce off a page?

      no that sounds kind of cool

12.31.23  5:41 pm   do you like being asked about specific bands/musicians?

      sure, but i'm usually not able to answer. too much pressure

12.31.23  3:41 pm   I am at war with an alien race trying to invade earth, are you the key to saving us?

      no, that sounds like fiction. something about the phrase "the key to saving us" sounds like one of those storybook-only phrases

12.31.23  3:38 pm   Favorite movie genre?

      i dislike them all equally. the movies, however, i might like, despite this

12.31.23  2:58 pm   hey, bill. what do you do after a bad day?

      have a good day after

12.31.23  2:40 pm   From 0% finsihed to 100% how finished are your videos your making?

      i'm not able to think about that. and if i knew, i also wouldn't want to say

12.31.23  1:22 pm   do you think time travel is possible

      it's impossible not to

12.31.23  12:57 pm   We should spell it grabitty since it grabs

      no

12.31.23  11:38 am   do you live under a rock 

      next to a rock

12.31.23  11:30 am   Where do you get the creativity to make your videos?

      on the stairs

12.31.23  10:59 am   Have you ever encountered the sludge?

      sorry which sludge

12.31.23  9:48 am   Favorite friends moment?

      the chandler handcuffs filing cabinet headbash. it's been said that this was unplanned, but i actually find that hard to believe

12.31.23  9:22 am   my very existence is somehow problematic to some, coincidentally it is to me too, what do i do that isn't needlessly rash?

      talk more about it with someone you trust

12.31.23  8:08 am   Are you going to continue releasing music?

      yes

12.31.23  8:01 am   how do i make music that sounds both good to myself and others?

      just keep doing it and it's going to happen. and try to go for your own tastes first, because that's the only tastes you can actually taste

12.31.23  7:29 am   i feel like a piece of shiny gold when i finish making an art thing

      i understand

12.31.23  5:57 am   Is your music supposed to make me cry tears of joy?

     if possible, yes

     When you make it do you know what you're doing? 

     yes
